channel.title: Home on Intershack - Jay Peak Vermont Skiing & Social Group
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Intershack - Jay Peak Vermont Skiing & Social Group

item.title: Committee Members
item.description:
We are looking for volunteers to help on the Committee. Email us at intershackgroup@gmail.com if you’re interested in contributing to our community!

Current Committee

Get Involved

Our committee is a fun group, and the time commitments are reasonable. There are several roles to fill, and we’re always looking for new members to help organize events and activities.

item.title: Intershack Welcome Cocktail
item.description:
The Intershack Welcome Cocktail will be held at the Tower Bar on Saturday November 29, from 4:00-6:00.

It is an opportunity to connect with old friends and meet new friends and hear about upcoming Intershack events.

Please let us know by Friday November 14th if you will be joining us so we can plan the food accordingly.

We look forward to seeing you at this event and future events throughout the season and here’s hoping to a repeat of the 2024/2025 winter snow!

item.title: Membership Form
item.description:
Membership Form

Please fill out the form below to join or renew your Intershack membership.

item.title: The Unvarnished History of Intershack
item.description:
In the beginning, there was no Intershack - but there were several ski houses in the Jay Peak area. Many of the house members were from Commonwealth countries-England, Australia, New Zealand, India, etc., and were also members of the Overseas Canadian Club in Montreal.

The O.C. Club had been formed early in 1968 by about ten people, of whom Mike Olsen and Jack Wilson were the prime instigators. It was modeled after the club in London where newcomers to England socialized and, similarly, the Montreal Club was a place where recent arrivals to Canada could meet their compatriots and have a good time.

item.title: Fred's Energy Group Buying Program
item.description:
Contact Information

Please email Chuck Jaschke at chuck.jaschke@gmail.com or call Fred’s Energy in Derby at 802-766-4949 for further details regarding this programme.

Intershack Propane Representative

Chuck Jaschke serves as the Intershack Propane Representative for this program.

item.title: Golf Events
item.description:
Annual Golf Tournament - September 3, 2023

Congratulations to all the winners of our 26th Annual Golf Tournament!

item.title: Merchant Partner Discounts
item.description:
Intershack members have access to special discounts from local businesses and service providers who support our community.

Available Discounts

We maintain partnerships with various local businesses to provide our members with exclusive discounts and special rates.

How to Access Discounts

Contact us at intershackgroup@gmail.com for current information about:

  • Available merchant partners
  • Current discount offers
  • How to access member rates
  • Participating businesses

Supporting Local Business

These partnerships benefit both our members and local businesses, creating a network of mutual support in the Jay Peak area and Montreal communities.
